sections.heading: Overview
content:
Susan Milstrey Wells has been a professional writer and editor for more than
20 years. A Phi Beta Kappa graduate of the State University of New York at
Albany, Wells was a newspaper reporter and public relations officer for private
schools and colleges. Currently, she writes about mental health, homelessness,
and managed care for the federal government. She is a contact person for the
Sjogren's Syndrome Foundation and a member of the Fibromyalgia Alliance of
America and the Interstitial Cystitis Association.
